GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: This file contains the metadata, events, and data for REDCap project "PCORI-ACP Recruitment".

Question.TranslatedText: Preferred language for written material communications

ItemDef.Name: original_pcp
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: This is the PCP when the provider was originally selected for the cohort. And it shall be used for contact at the begining of the study

Question.TranslatedText: Primary Care Provider at the time of the patient selection.

ItemDef.Name: original_pcp_email
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: This is the PCP when the provider was originally selected for the cohort. And it shall be used for contact at the begining of the study

Question.TranslatedText: Provider Email at the time of the patient selection.

ItemDef.Name: clinic_grey
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: In the data analytic plan, this corresponds to the grey dot, and it captures the clinic assignment at the time when the patient was selected for the cohott

Question.TranslatedText: Clinic at the time of patient selection

ItemDef.Name: arm_grey
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: In the data analytic plan, this corresponds to the grey dot, and it captures the arm assignment at the time when the patient was selected for the cohott

Question.TranslatedText: Arm at the time of patient selection

ItemDef.Name: clinic_orange
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: In the data analytic plan, this corresponds to the orange dot, and it captures the clinic assignment at the time when the clinic went live

Question.TranslatedText: Clinic at the time when clinic went live

ItemDef.Name: arm_orange
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: In the data analytic plan, this corresponds to the orange dot, and it captures the arm assignment at the time when the clinic went live

Question.TranslatedText: Arm the time when clinic went live

ItemDef.Name: clinic_red
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: In the data analytic plan, this corresponds to the red dot, and it captures the clinic assignment at the time when the first intervention was triggered

Question.TranslatedText: Clinic assigned when the first intervention was triggered

ItemDef.Name: arm_red
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: In the data analytic plan, this corresponds to the red dot, and it captures the arm assignment at the time when the first intervention was triggered

Question.TranslatedText: Arm assigned when the first intervention was triggered

ItemDef.Name: phone_priority_hcwo
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: The numbers shows the calling priority defined by the patient, 1 being the best number to call, 2 the second, and so forth. Match phone number to their ranking based on the following order (Home | Cell | Work | Other)

Question.TranslatedText: Phone priority contact. (Home | Cell | Work | Other)

ItemDef.Name: exclude_from_pop_cohort_reason
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: Explanation to the question about excluding patient from population cohort

ItemDef.Name: first_email_pcp_reply
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: The "Other" option includes multiple scenarios that exclude the patient from being contacted until further review is done

ItemDef.Name: second_email_pcp_reply
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: The "Other" option includes multiple scenarios that exclude the patient from being contacted until further review is done

ItemDef.Name: first_mailing_exclusion
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: When a patient can't be contacted in the first batch mailing due to multiple reasons

Question.TranslatedText: Excluded from first mailing due to out of office exception, PCP not found, or any other situation

ItemDef.Name: oof_situation_resolved_yn
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: Once the exception is handled, this field shall mark what patients can be contacted

Question.TranslatedText: Exceptional situation has been resolved to satisfaction

ItemDef.Name: exception_handling_explanation
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: Explain how the exception for this patient was handled

Question.TranslatedText: Is the patient known to be deceased? (yes/no)

ItemDef.Name: first_intervention_dt
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: The first intervention date is used to calculate the timeline for the 12 months and 24 months follow up.This date is populated from the database

Question.TranslatedText: Patient has reached the 12 months threshold since first intervention
Patient has reached the 24 months threshold since first intervention

ItemDef.Name: survey_completed_yn
ItemDef.redcap:SectionHeader:
Patient information: First Name: [event_baseline_arm_1][first_name] Last Name: [event_baseline_arm_1][last_name] MRN: [event_baseline_arm_1][mrn] Address: [event_baseline_arm_1][address] City: [event_baseline_arm_1][city] State: [event_baseline_arm_1][state] ZIP code: [event_baseline_arm_1][zip_code] Phone #1: [event_baseline_arm_1][phone1] Phone #2: [event_baseline_arm_1][phone2] Caregiver Name: [event_baseline_arm_1][caregiver_name] Caregiver Phone: [event_baseline_arm_1][caregiver_phone]

Question.TranslatedText: Was survey completed by paper, phone or email?
Was the survey completed by the patient or caregiver?
HIPAA included in survey mailing? Y/N

ItemDef.Name: max_calls_yn
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: If there is a date in the Phone Contact #3(date) field, this will be set to 'Yes'

ItemDef.Name: target_12mo_dt
ItemDef.redcap:FieldNote: (Study start date + 12 months)
